mn142:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
mn142:3.3: Atha kho mahāpajāpati gotamī navaṃ dussayugaṃ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn142:3.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn142:3.6: “idaṃ me, bhante, navaṃ dussayugaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa sāmaṃ kantaṃ sāmaṃ vāyitaṃ.
mn142:3.7: Taṃ me, bhante, bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
mn142:3.8: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ etadavoca:
mn142:3.10: Saṃghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṃgho cā”ti.
mn142:4.1: Dutiyampi kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn142:4.2: “idaṃ me, bhante, navaṃ dussayugaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa sāmaṃ kantaṃ sāmaṃ vāyitaṃ.
mn142:4.3: Taṃ me, bhante, bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
mn142:4.4: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ etadavoca:
mn142:4.6: Saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti.
mn142:5.1: Tatiyampi kho mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn142:5.2: “idaṃ me, bhante, navaṃ dussayugaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa sāmaṃ kantaṃ sāmaṃ vāyitaṃ.
mn142:5.3: Taṃ me, bhante, bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
mn142:5.4: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā mahāpajāpatiṃ gotamiṃ etadavoca:
mn142:5.6: Saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti.
mn142:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn142:6.2: “paṭiggaṇhātu, bhante, bhagavā mahāpajāpatiyā gotamiyā navaṃ dussayugaṃ.
mn142:6.3: Bahūpakārā, bhante, mahāpajāpati gotamī bhagavato mātucchā āpādikā posikā khīrassa dāyikā;
mn142:6.6: Bhagavantaṃ, bhante, āgamma mahāpajāpati gotamī buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā, saṃghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatā.
mn142:6.7: Bhagavantaṃ, bhante, āgamma mahāpajāpati gotamī pāṇātipātā paṭiviratā adinnādānā paṭiviratā kāmesumicchācārā paṭiviratā musāvādā paṭiviratā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratā.
mn142:6.8: Bhagavantaṃ, bhante, āgamma mahāpajāpati gotamī buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatā, dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgatā, saṃghe aveccappasādena samannāgatā ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgatā.
mn142:6.9: Bhagavantaṃ, bhante, āgamma mahāpajāpati gotamī dukkhe nikkaṅkhā, dukkhasamudaye nikkaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhe nikkaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya nikkaṅkhā.
mn142:7.2: Yaṃ hānanda, puggalo puggalaṃ āgamma buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, imassānanda, puggalassa iminā puggalena na suppatikāraṃ vadāmi, yadidaṃ—
mn142:8.1: Yaṃ hānanda, puggalo puggalaṃ āgamma pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, imassānanda, puggalassa iminā puggalena na suppatikāraṃ vadāmi, yadidaṃ—
mn142:9.1: Yaṃ hānanda, puggalo puggalaṃ āgamma buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti, dhamme …
mn142:9.3: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti, imassānanda, puggalassa iminā puggalena na suppatikāraṃ vadāmi, yadidaṃ—
mn142:10.1: Yaṃ hānanda, puggalo puggalaṃ āgamma dukkhe nikkaṅkho hoti, dukkhasamudaye nikkaṅkho hoti, dukkhanirodhe nikkaṅkho hoti, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya nikkaṅkho hoti, imassānanda, puggalassa iminā puggalena na suppatikāraṃ vadāmi, yadidaṃ—
mn142:12.1: Tatrānanda, tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā, puthujjanadussīle dānaṃ datvā sahassaguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā, puthujjanasīlavante dānaṃ datvā satasahassaguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā, bāhirake kāmesu vītarāge dānaṃ datvā koṭisatasahassaguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā, sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne dānaṃ datvā asaṅkheyyā appameyyā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā, ko pana vādo sotāpanne, ko pana vādo sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne, ko pana vādo sakadāgāmissa, ko pana vādo anāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne, ko pana vādo anāgāmissa, ko pana vādo arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne, ko pana vādo arahante, ko pana vādo paccekasambuddhe, ko pana vādo tathāgate arahante sammāsambuddhe.
mn142:13.11: ‘Ettakā me bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca saṅghato uddissathā’ti dānaṃ deti—
mn142:13.13: ‘Ettakā me bhikkhū saṅghato uddissathā’ti dānaṃ deti—
mn142:13.15: ‘Ettakā me bhikkhuniyo saṅghato uddissathā’ti dānaṃ deti—
mn142:14.1: Bhavissanti kho panānanda, anāgatamaddhānaṃ gotrabhuno kāsāvakaṇṭhā dussīlā pāpadhammā.
mn142:14.2: Tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassanti.
mn142:14.3: Tadāpāhaṃ, ānanda, saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkheyyaṃ appameyyaṃ vadāmi.
mn142:14.4: Na tvevāhaṃ, ānanda, kenaci pariyāyena saṅghagatāya dakkhiṇāya pāṭipuggalikaṃ dānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ vadāmi.
mn142:15.1: Catasso kho imā, ānanda, dakkhiṇā visuddhiyo.
mn142:15.3: Atthānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati no paṭiggāhakato.
mn142:15.4: Atthānanda, dakkhiṇā paṭiggāhakato visujjhati no dāyakato.
mn142:15.5: Atthānanda, dakkhiṇā neva dāyakato visujjhati no paṭiggāhakato.
mn142:15.6: Atthānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato ca.
mn142:16.1: Kathañcānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati no paṭiggāhakato?
mn142:16.2: Idhānanda, dāyako hoti sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, paṭiggāhakā honti dussīlā pāpadhammā—
mn142:16.3: evaṃ kho, ānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhati no paṭiggāhakato.
mn142:17.1: Kathañcānanda, dakkhiṇā paṭiggāhakato visujjhati no dāyakato?
mn142:17.2: Idhānanda, dāyako hoti dussīlo pāpadhammo, paṭiggāhakā honti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā—
mn142:17.3: evaṃ kho, ānanda, dakkhiṇā paṭiggāhakato visujjhati no dāyakato.
mn142:18.1: Kathañcānanda, dakkhiṇā neva dāyakato visujjhati no paṭiggāhakato?
mn142:18.2: Idhānanda, dāyako ca hoti dussīlo pāpadhammo, paṭiggāhakā ca honti dussīlā pāpadhammā—
mn142:18.3: evaṃ kho, ānanda, dakkhiṇā neva dāyakato visujjhati no paṭiggāhakato.
mn142:19.1: Kathañcānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato ca?
mn142:19.2: Idhānanda, dāyako ca hoti sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo, paṭiggāhakā ca honti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā—
mn142:19.3: evaṃ kho, ānanda, dakkhiṇā dāyakato ceva visujjhati paṭiggāhakato ca.
mn142:19.4: Imā kho, ānanda, catasso dakkhiṇā visuddhiyo”ti.
mn142:20.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
